atlantic.title: Why the NYPD Turned Its Back on the City
atlantic.topComment: Imagine if the police were subjected to the same level of political criticism as teachers and policing subject to the constant reform that education is... Would the police start opening fire on politicians?!

atlantic.title: The High-Tech Future of the Uterus
atlantic.topComment: They need to develop one for men so my husband can have our next child! I will gladly donate my uterus to him.
